head.title: Home - Nottoway County School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.div: 10321 East Colonial Trail Highway, Nottoway, VA 23955

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h2: Welcome to Nottoway County Public Schools

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; text-align: center;

span.style: font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

div.style: font-family: "arial narrow", sans-serif; font-size: large; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
div.span: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Governor Northam announced on March 23rd his decision to close all public and private schoolsthrough the end of the current (2019-2020) school year.

div.style: font-family: "arial narrow", sans-serif; font-size: large; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
font-family: "arial narrow", sans-serif; font-size: large; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
div.span:
The Virginia Department of Education will provide us and all other school divisions in the Commonwealth with guidance for graduation requirements, awarding standard and verified credits, providing food service, and the continuity of instructionin an equitable manner to alleviate instructional gaps while schools are closed.
================================================

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: large; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 12px; font-family: Tahoma;

p.span: Dear Students, Staff, and Families of Nottoway County,

br.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: large; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-family: Tahoma;;font-size: 12px;;background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: I am Dr. Tameshia V. Grimes, and I am honored to have been appointed as Division Superintendent for Nottoway County Public Schools. I bring over 20 years of experience as an educator, having served as a teacher, coach, assistant principal, principal, and central office administrator with responsibilities for the many components of Student Support Services.

br.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: large; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-family: Tahoma;;font-size: 12px;;background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: In addition to being a long-time educator, I also am a life-long learner, having earned four degrees - Bachelor of Arts in English from Randolph-Macon College, Masters of Arts in English from VCU, Education Specialist in Supervision and Evaluation from George Washington University, and Ph.D. in Educational Leadership from VCU - and continuously learning from my interactions with students, staff, parents, and community members, as well as attending workshops, conferences, and classes to help me remain knowledgeable of innovations in education that may benefit our students.

br.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: large; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: I am a student-first educator, believing that every decision made should be done with the mindset of what is best for our students. I believe that every child is born with unique gifts and talents that manifest themselves in different ways; I believe that every one of us is born with a thirst for knowledge that education must support by providing opportunities for students to explore, question, and collaborate in order to create new learning and maintain students curiosity and engagement in learning; and I believe that educators have a responsibility to

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: each of our students as individuals in order to support their learning and growth. My goal as Division Superintendent is to work with faculty and staff to support schools and classrooms where our students want to be and where learning is fun and relevant so that our students graduate

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: : well-rounded adults who are able to contribute to our world - local and global - by understanding and adapting to the diverse people, cultures, and organizations that they will encounter.

br.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: large; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-family: Tahoma;;font-size: 12px;;background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: I am excited to serve the students, staff, families, and friends of Nottoway County Public Schools; I look forward to partnering with the entire Nottoway community and working together to achieve our goal of Excellence in Education for Nottoway County Public Schools.

br.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: large; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-family: Tahoma;;font-size: 12px;;background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: large; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 12px; font-family: Tahoma;
